definition: to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: He inspires me and becomes a good friend of mine.
sentences.chinese: 他成了我的忘年交也为我带来启发。

sentences.english: Creative Adam and Eve inspired blanket cover for your bed.
sentences.chinese: 受亚当和夏娃所启发的创意毛毯床罩。

sentences.english: After forty minutes of interaction with the students, everyone says they are inspired to follow an eco-friendly way of life.
sentences.chinese: 四十分钟的互动下来，孩子们的环保心也跟著被启发。

sentences.english: The Heuristic will be similar to CIMA and on similar lines to Kaspersky and Avira.
sentences.chinese: 启发式将类似于西玛和类似的行卡巴斯基和查杀。

sentences.english: Topic designing is the key step of heuristic discussion teaching.
sentences.chinese: 问题设置是启发讨论式教学中的关键环节。

sentences.english: Modern clock inspired by the movement of Japanese folding fan.
sentences.chinese: 受日本折扇的转动所启发而制作的时尚时钟。

sentences.english: A new heuristic density-based ant colony clustering algorithm (HDACC) is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于密度的启发性群体智能聚类算法。

sentences.english: A firm and solid will could awaken our wisdom, not just our conscience.
sentences.chinese: 若是道心坚固，就能够启发我们的智慧，不只是良知。

sentences.english: Dr Schnall's study was inspired by some previous work of her own.
sentences.chinese: Schnall博士的研究受她先前研究工作的启发。

sentences.english: So here are my takeaways from the story
sentences.chinese: 我从这个故事中得到了以下启发。

sentences.english: Wooden computer case inspired by the Steampunk movement.
sentences.chinese: 由蒸汽朋克运动所启发的木质电脑机箱。

sentences.english: Searching the text-searchable parts you are interested in does not require an heuristic approach.
sentences.chinese: 搜索您感兴趣的可搜索部分不需要启发式方法。

sentences.english: Creative bedding set inspired by the iconic video game console.
sentences.chinese: 受到标志性的视频游戏机所启发的创意床上用品。

sentences.english: and what implications that has on our society here in the United States and throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 以及他们对于我们美国社会和整个世界的启发。

sentences.english: Love comes to man through his senses , to woman through her imagination.
sentences.chinese: 男人靠触感来启发爱意，女人透过想像感受情爱。

sentences.english: That, he said, might help enlighten them.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这样或许可以启发他们。

definition: inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]/to instruct the young
to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
